item.title: 运维实用技巧
item.description: env环境变量取消 ALL_PROXY unset all_proxy && unset ALL_PROXY http static tool python2 python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8000 python3 python3 -m http.server 8000 showme static 1 2 3 4 wget https://github.com/lflxp/showme/releases/download/v0.5/showme-x86-amd64.tar.gz tar -zxvf ./showme-x86-amd64.tar.gz chmod +x showme showme static rust https://github.com/brson/basic-http-server 1 2 cargo install basic-http-server basic-http-server -x
